summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department recycling and resource recovery program; authorizing the Mayor to sign an Interlocal Agreement with King County and the City of Bellevue for the purpose of carrying out a grant program funded by the United States Environmental Protection Agency to study the feasibility of recycling of and energy recovery from solid waste in the King County area; and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1979 Budget of the Recycling and Resource Recovery Program and making an appropriation from the Solid Waste Fund therefor.
